## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve. 

**Example**: "As a wing administrator, I need to [do something] so that [benefit]."

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Benefits
Who would benefit from this feature?
- [ ] Small wings (<200 members)
- [ ] Medium wings (200-500 members)
- [ ] Large wings (500+ members)
- [ ] All wings
- [ ] Specific use case (explain below)

## Implementation Complexity
What's your assessment of implementation difficulty?
- [ ] Simple (config change)
- [ ] Moderate (new function)
- [ ] Complex (major refactoring)
- [ ] Unsure

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, examples, or screenshots about the feature request here.

## Related Features
Are there existing features this relates to or depends on?

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - blocking current operations
- [ ] High - significant improvement
- [ ] Medium - nice to have
- [ ] Low - minor enhancement

## Volunteer
Are you willing to help implement this feature?
- [ ] Yes, I can submit a PR
- [ ] Yes, I can help test
- [ ] Yes, I can help document
- [ ] No, but I can provide feedback

## CAP-Wide Impact
Would other CAP wings benefit from this feature?
- [ ] Yes, this is a common need
- [ ] Maybe, depends on wing setup
- [ ] No, this is wing-specific
- [ ] Unsure
